title: Panoptic Beta Launch: Epoch 1 Participants
description: We are excited to announce the selection of participants for the first epoch of our [gated, beta launch](https://panoptic.xyz/blog/gated-launch-sign-up). Our beta launch is structured as multiple epochs, or rounds, of trading competitions where participants use real assets to buy and sell DeFi-native options.
